title: Hunger Games Catching Fire 2013 English Movie Audio
description:
Original Video here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9235763/The_Hunger_Games_Catching_Fire_2013_TS_XViD_Dub_Ad


CFAudio for the Portuguese Dub. 

For those of you still struggling with sync to English Audio, here's a step by step.
1. VLC: File > Advanced Open File
Choose hunger games cam, and check "play another media synchronously" and choose CFA
2. Choose English audio: Audio < Audio Track < Track 2
3. Window > Track Sync > type -15900 in the audio sync box
